price: Dan (ingatlah), hari yang di waktu itu Kami menghimpun mereka semuanya464, kemudian Kami berkata kepada orang-orang musyrik, "Di manakah sembahan-sembahan kamu yang dahulu kamu katakan (sekutu-sekutu Kami)?"
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُوٓاْ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآؤُكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ
footnotes: 464.  Semua makhluk Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā yang mukalaf.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma naḥshuruhum jamīʿan thumma naqūlu lilladhīna ashrakū ayna shurakāukumu alladhīna kuntum tazʿumūna
